description: Defines Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes for Product API, including request and response classes for creating, updating, and representing products, in order to separate API contract from persistence model.

classes.name: CreateProductRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a new product, includes validation annotations and API schema descriptions.

classes.name: UpdateProductRequest
classes.description: DTO for updating an existing product, includes validation annotations and API schema descriptions.

classes.name: ProductResponse
classes.description: DTO for representing a product in responses, includes constructors and Swagger schema annotations.

methods.name: ProductResponse(Long id, String name, BigDecimal price, Integer quantity)
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for creating a ProductResponse with specific values.
